Uses of Interface
entity.Occupant

  • Packages that use Occupant 
    Package Description
    entity  
    grid  

    • Uses of Occupant in entity

      Subinterfaces of Occupant in entity 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Combatant
      A combatant is an occupant that is able to fight; this implies that they have all the attributes that a typical player has, such as health, momentum, an inventory, and equipment.
      Classes in entity that implement Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Player
      The player (You).

    • Uses of Occupant in grid

      Methods in grid that return Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Occupant Tile.getOccupant() 
      Occupant Grid.searchForOccupant(int id)
      Searches for an entity within the grid, given the id.
      Occupant Tile.vacateOccupant()
      Removes the occupant from a tile.
      Methods in grid with parameters of type Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Tile.fillOccupant(Occupant newOccupant)
      Attempts to place an occupant in an empty tile.
